lesson.title: Should / Ought To: Modals and Usage

modules.name: Learn
modules.title: Modals Lessons
modules.instructions: Study 'should' and 'ought to' for giving advice, expressing expectations, and logical reasoning about what is appropriate.

modules.name: Write
modules.title: Writing Practice
modules.instructions: Create sentences using 'should' and 'ought to' to provide recommendations and express what seems likely or appropriate.

modules.name: Play
modules.title: Grammar Games
modules.instructions: Participate in interactive games that strengthen your understanding of how and when to use these advisory modals.

modules.name: Quiz
modules.title: Quick Quiz
modules.instructions: Answer brief multiple-choice questions to verify your knowledge of 'should' and 'ought to' usage.

modules.name: Apply
modules.title: Advice & Modal Challenge
modules.instructions: Test your spelling and practical application of 'should' and 'ought to' in real-world contexts.
